project.description: Deploys a multi-host cloud on 4 servers, making sure each server gets a distinct compute worker. If configured in ha mode, each server gets both a compute and a network worker.

hudson.model.RunParameterDefinition.name: Build
hudson.model.RunParameterDefinition.description: A central build, if you don't want to use PrivateBuildURL above.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PrivateBuildURL
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description:
The URL that the VPX and associated scripts can be downloaded from. Should be the subdirectory that contains os-vpx.xva or os-vpx-devel.xva, install-os-vpx.sh, etc.
If you want to use a central build instead, use Build below.

org.jvnet.jenkins.plugins.nodelabelparam.name: SiteLabel
org.jvnet.jenkins.plugins.nodelabelparam.description:
One of "cambourne", "cambridge", "santa-clara", or "redmond".
Make sure that this matches the PrivateBuildURL parameter above! If you get this wrong, then you will end up streaming VM images from one site to another, and the build will time out.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Server1
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: This will completely wipe the specified machine! Leave blank to use the default test machine on the specified site. Use ssh-upload-jenkins-keys from root@openstack-jenkins.uk.xensource.com to allow remote login.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Server2
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: This will completely wipe the specified machine! Leave blank to use the default test machine on the specified site. Use ssh-upload-jenkins-keys from root@openstack-jenkins.uk.xensource.com to allow remote login.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Server3
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: This will completely wipe the specified machine! Leave blank to use the default test machine on the specified site. Use ssh-upload-jenkins-keys from root@openstack-jenkins.uk.xensource.com to allow remote login.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Server4
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: This will completely wipe the specified machine! Leave blank to use the default test machine on the specified site. Use ssh-upload-jenkins-keys from root@openstack-jenkins.uk.xensource.com to allow remote login.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Password
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The XenServer root password. Leave blank to use the default site password.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: MasterBootOptions
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Boot options (aka kernel arguments) to be passed to the master VPX. It defaults to MASTER_BOOT_OPTIONS var set by site files.

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: Devel
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Whether to use the os-vpx-devel build, as opposed to the release build.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: ManagementNetworkNic
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The XenServer NIC which will be used for creating the Management VLAN

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: GuestNetworkNic
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The XenServer NIC which will be used for creating the VLAN for guest instance networking

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PublicNetworkNic
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The XenServer NIC which will be used for creating the VLAN for published services and floating IPs

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: ManagementNetworkVLAN
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: VLAN ID for the management network

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: GuestNetworkVLAN
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: VLAN ID to be used for guest instance networking

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PublicNetworkVLAN
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: VLAN ID for the published services networks

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: NetworkingMode
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Network manager to employ. Adding the "-ha" suffix to the manager specifies HA networking configuration.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: FloatingIPRange
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Range of IP addresses for assigning Floating IPs

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DnsSuffix
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: DNS Suffix for VPX hosts, for resolving VPX names on the management network. NOTE: Choose something different from openstack.com only if the build being deployed is configured to use a different DNS suffix.
